member.name: T:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload
member.summary: Upload a file to a project hosted at http://code.google.com

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.Execute
member.summary: Upload the file

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.CreateAuthorizationToken(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the authorization token.

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.WriteLine(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the string to the specified stream and concatenates a newline.

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.WriteFile(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the specified file to the specified stream.

members.member:
User name for the Google Code profile
The UserName can also be specified in the registry under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MSBuild.Community.Tasks.GoogleCode.Upload\$(ProjectName)\UserName

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.Password
member.summary: Password for the Google Code profile. Note that this is NOT your global Google Account password.

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.ProjectName
member.summary: Name of the Google Code project

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.LocalFile
member.summary: Local path of the file to be uploaded

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.RemoteFile
member.summary: Name of the file on the server

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.GoogleCode.Upload.Summary
member.summary: Summary for the upload

member.name: T:Sidi.Build.SourceIndex
member.summary: Modifies the symbol files (*.pdb) of specified modules so that the debugger can download the source files from a URL

member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.SourceIndex.Execute
member.summary: Executes the task

member.name: M:Sidi.Build.SourceIndex.AddSourceIndex(System.String)
member.summary: Modifies pdbFile so that it references the source files not over a local directory but an URL

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.SourceIndex.SrcsrvStream
member.summary: Name of the stream in the PDB file containing the source information

member.name: P:Sidi.Build.SourceIndex.Directory
member.summary: Local source directory

member.summary: URL that contains the same source files as the local source directory

member.summary: Modules to be source-indexed
